reviews.text: This hotel advertised that it was smack bang in the middle of Amsterdam. What a joke ! It's nowhere near it. It's several miles outside of Amsterdam - at least a 30 minute tram ride and when you get off the tram, if you'd never been there before, you'd have no idea how to get to the hotel. It's surrounded by freeways and construction sites and a canal and you are metres away from it but can't get to the entrance.
reviews.title: Hotel Advertising Location is a lie. Avoid this hotel.

likes.liked: — Leaving it on the last day.
likes.disliked: — Arriving and finding out it was miles out of town.
